decisions.description: SCM present - crew membership exist for updated absence date Is CrewAbsence exist - SR absence date is updated and no crew found for updated date (delete the crew absence if exist)
decisions.name: Check_if_SCM_present
decisions.label: Check if SCM present

decisions.name: Copy_3_of_SA_Status_NOT_Completed_Cancelled_Cannot_Complete
decisions.label: Copy 3 of SA Status NOT Completed/Cancelled/Cannot Complete?

rules.name: Copy_3_of_True
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND ((4 AND 7) OR (5 AND 6) OR (4 AND 8) OR (9 AND 7))
rules.label: Copy 3 of True

rules.name: Copy_3_of_reset
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ((3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6)) AND 7
rules.label: Copy 3 of reset

decisions.name: SA_Status_NOT_Completed_Cancelled_Cannot_Complete_UPDATE
decisions.label: SA Status NOT Completed/Cancelled/Cannot Complete? UPDATE

rules.name: True_for_updated
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND ((4 AND 7) OR (5 AND 6) OR (4 AND 8) OR (9 AND 7))
rules.label: True for updated

rules.name: reset_for_updated
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ((3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6)) AND 7
rules.label: reset for updated

Flow.description: Created as part of SFS-2979 Updated as part of SFS-3056 SFS-3040-V3 updated as part of SFS-8393 updated as part of SFS-8610. updated as part of SFS-8677 Updated as part of SFL-524 updated as part of SFL-966 updated again for SFL-966
Flow.label: FSM Resource Absence - AfterTrigger

recordLookups.name: Get_SA_Record_for_crew
recordLookups.label: Get SA Record for crew
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND ((2 AND 5) OR (3 AND 4) OR (2 AND 6) OR (5 AND 7))

recordLookups.label: Get SA Record for crew updated

recordLookups.name: Get_SA_Record_for_Non_crew
recordLookups.label: Get SA Record for Non crew
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND ((2 AND 5) OR (3 AND 4) OR (2 AND 6) OR (5 AND 7))

recordLookups.name: Get_SA_Record_for_Non_crew_updated
recordLookups.label: Get SA Record for Non crew updated

recordLookups.description: Moved Position as part of SFS-8677
recordLookups.name: Get_SCM
recordLookups.label: Get SCM
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND ((2 AND 3) OR ( 4 AND 7 AND 3) OR (2 AND 6 AND 5 ) OR (4 AND 5))
